page.title: 15GLAISYER WAY.
page.content: Glaisyer Way is a street off Church Road.There are 29 houses in Glaisyer Way in either terraced or semi-detached style.The houses are 15 years old which means they were built in 1970.The average amount of people which live in each house is 3.6. Every house down Glaisyer Way have 9 rooms in them appart from 2 of them which have 10 rooms because of extensions.Some of the houses have had home improvements like porches and patio doors.Some of the houses have their kitchens at the front and the others have their kitchens at the back and the lounges at the front.About 60% of the houses have their garages next to them and the other houses have separate garages across the road. BY MANDY WEBB (AGED 11)
